root.name: Smooth Criminal
root.description: The King of Pop returns in this videogame adaptation of his hit video and song, Smooth Criminal. An unofficial spiritual successor to Moonwalker, Smooth Criminal gives the player control of Michael Jackson. In Smooth Criminal, the player plays through the events of the video, as well as re-imagined locations from Michael's other music videos and short films, such as Thriller, Billie Jean, and Bad. Smooth Criminal is a third-person shooter, equipping Michael with the iconic Tommy-Gun he used in the video/short film. This game is being made for the fans and is dedicated to the memory of Michael Jackson. The BETA will be a GiantBomb exclusive.
